title: Donald Trump Jr. is caught up, Facebook Betrayal, Toni Braxton Stops by, and more!
itunes:title: Donald Trump Jr. is caught up, Facebook Betrayal, Toni Braxton Stops by, and more!
description:
Happy Friday. Today the show talks about Trump Jr. and his sexting. We also find out the worst news regarding Facebook. Toni Braxton also stops by and Steve explains the importance of cutting extra baggage while moving up the ladder of success. Have a great weekend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
